subject: Order #SSN5283
description_text:
Hi,

I have not received the order, and there has been no update about the order.

Order #SSN5283

Can you let me know the status of the order?


Regards,

Edgar

conversations.body_text: SF International shows the tracking number as not in use for 3 months

Hi Edgar Lau,     Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We confirm your order was shipped on the 13th and sincerely apologize for the delay. Below is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047201468703
